enableExistentialThemes.name: Enable Deep Existential Themes
enableExistentialThemes.hint: When enabled, NPCs will have more profound existential crises and philosophical depth.

includeContradictions.name: Include Personal Contradictions
includeContradictions.hint: When enabled, NPCs will have internal contradictions that make them more complex.

philosophicalComplexity.name: Philosophical Complexity Level
philosophicalComplexity.hint: Controls the depth of philosophical themes in generated NPCs.
